document_data.name: Thungor Triblane
document_data.mainbody: '''Thungor Triblane''' was an [[gnome|gnomish]] [[illusionist]] [[Adventurer|ex-adventurer]] and the innkeeper of the [[Windlord's Rest]] in [[Tilverton]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Thungor was generally honest and forthright with others, but was willing to conspire a bit with [[Filani]] to extract maximum information and money from strangers. He could be a touch intimidated by people taller than him.
document_data.Activities: Thungor managed the [[Windlord's Rest]], an inn of good quality in the town. He treated his guests like adopted children, giving them paternal advice, scoldings, pocket money, and other affectionate treats. Although some were driven away by this behavious, the majority of guests adored it, and made sure to return to the Windlord whenever possible.
document_data.Relationship: Thungor was a good friend of the sage [[Filani]], who he had adventured with previously.
document_data.History: Thungor adventured with the [[wizard]] Filani for a time, eventually retiring to Tilverton and setting up the Windlord's Rest inn by [[1358 DR]]. By the 1360s DR, his business proved too popular and he moved his premises to a larger location nearby, causing much confusion to returning customers who instead found the [[Jonstyl's Banner]].
